law.catch_line: Release of prisoners on first day of month of sentence expiration.
law.text: The commissioner of the Department of Corrections may permit the release of the prisoners on the first day of the month in which their sentences would expire; if the first day of the month falls on Saturday, Sunday, or a legal holiday, the prisoners may be released on the last weekday of the preceding month.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 55, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 497, sec. 11, effective July 13, 1990.
